A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been watching Starwars movies since I was little kid and there was no way in the world I was going to miss the next installment.  The Last Jedi it's a Breathtaking and beautiful movie that had me on the edge of the seat the whole time with excitement and plot twists that only gives me the desire to see the next movie. The movie was full of surprises that I didn't expect at all and\, since a predictable movie its nothing but a boring flick\, that's a good thing. Would I have done something different? Sure\, but I'm in for the ride that Lucasfilm is taking me with this trilogy and that ride finishes when episode IX is done and the full vision its presented.
